title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
our way to him.

There are 4 trials in The Wyrmway you need to complete to enter Dragon's Sanctum. The Chamber of Courage is a trial by combat, you need to survive 4 rounds against elementals.

The Chamber of Strategy is a chess puzzle, when you enter the room, it will randomly generate a chess endgame and you need to finish the Black King in limited moves. If you have Gale, he will comment that he played "Lanceboard" a lot and will provide you with two different solutions. Below is one of the p
